languages.text: Хормейстер Вайс — могучий телепат, способный отыскать заговорщиков по темному следу изменнических мыслей. Найти его можно в капелле астропатического хора.

traits.locale_text: Мастер астропатического хора может помочь в поиске заговорщиков. Нужно прийти в капеллу астропатического хора и поговорить с ним.

languages.text: Choirmaster Weisz is a powerful telepath who can track down the conspirators by following the dark traces of their traitorous thoughts. The Lord Captain can find him at the Astropathic Chapel.
languages.original_text: Хормейстер Вайс — могучий телепат, способный отыскать заговорщиков по темному следу изменнических мыслей. Найти его можно в капелле астропатического хора.

traits.locale_text: Choirmaster Weisz is a powerful telepath who can find the conspirators by following the dark traces of their traitorous thoughts. The Lord Captain can find him at the Astropathic Chapel.

Choirmaster Weisz is a powerful telepath who can track down the conspirators by following the dark traces of their traitorous thoughts. The Lord Captain can find him at the Astropathic Chapel.

languages.text: Le maître de chœur Weisz est un puissant télépathe et pourrait retrouver la trace des conspirateurs en suivant la piste de leurs pensées traîtresses. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} le trouvera dans la chapelle astropathique.
languages.original_text: Choirmaster Weisz is a powerful telepath who can track down the conspirators by following the dark traces of their traitorous thoughts. The Lord Captain can find him at the Astropathic Chapel.

traits.locale_text: Le maître de chœur Weisz est un puissant télépathe et pourrait retrouver la trace des conspirateurs en suivant la piste de leurs pensées traîtresses. {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} le trouvera dans la chapelle astropathique.

languages.text: El maestro de coro Weisz es un poderoso telépata que puede rastrear a los conspiradores mediante los oscuros rastros de sus pensamientos traicioneros. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán lo encontrará en la Capilla de Astrópatas.
languages.original_text: Choirmaster Weisz is a powerful telepath who can track down the conspirators by following the dark traces of their traitorous thoughts. The Lord Captain can find him at the Astropathic Chapel.

traits.locale_text: El maestro de coro Weisz es un poderoso telépata que puede rastrear a los conspiradores mediante los oscuros rastros de sus pensamientos traicioneros. {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán lo encontrará en la Capilla de Astrópatas.

languages.text: 唱诗大师威茨是位强大的心灵感应者，他可以追踪叛徒阴暗的思想痕迹，从而找到这件事情的主谋。舰长大人可以在星语者教堂里找到他。
languages.original_text: Choirmaster Weisz is a powerful telepath who can track down the conspirators by following the dark traces of their traitorous thoughts. The Lord Captain can find him at the Astropathic Chapel.

traits.locale_text: 唱诗大师威茨是位强大的心灵感应者，他可以追踪叛徒阴暗的思想痕迹，从而找到这件事情的主谋。舰长大人可以在星语者教堂里找到他。

languages.text: クワイアーマスター・ワイズは強力なテレパシー使いであり、裏切り者の思考の痕跡をたどることで、共謀者を突き止めることができる。ロード・キャプテンは彼を感応通信官で見つけることができる。
languages.original_text: Choirmaster Weisz is a powerful telepath who can track down the conspirators by following the dark traces of their traitorous thoughts. The Lord Captain can find him at the Astropathic Chapel.

traits.locale_text: クワイアーマスター・ワイズは強力なテレパシー使いであり、裏切り者の思考の痕跡をたどることで、共謀者を突き止めることができる。ロード・キャプテンは彼を感応通信官で見つけることができる。

languages.text: Chormeister Weisz ist ein mächtiger Telepath, der die Verschwörer aufspüren kann, indem er den dunklen Spuren ihrer verräterischen Gedanken folgt. Der Lord Captain findet ihn in der Astropathischen Kapelle.
languages.original_text: Choirmaster Weisz is a powerful telepath who can track down the conspirators by following the dark traces of their traitorous thoughts. The Lord Captain can find him at the Astropathic Chapel.

traits.locale_text: Chormeister Weisz ist ein mächtiger Telepath, der die Verschwörer aufspüren kann, indem er den dunklen Spuren ihrer verräterischen Gedanken folgt. Der Lord Captain findet ihn in der Astropathischen Kapelle.

languages.text: Koro Şefi Weisz, komplocuların hain düşüncelerinin bıraktığı karanlık izlerin peşine düşerek izlerini sürebilecek güçlü bir telepat. Lord Kaptan, onu Astropatik Şapel'de bulabilir.
languages.original_text: Choirmaster Weisz is a powerful telepath who can track down the conspirators by following the dark traces of their traitorous thoughts. The Lord Captain can find him at the Astropathic Chapel.
